article_title: UK-Israeli hostage has been forgotten, says mum
sentence: Emily  Damari,  28,  was  shot  and  taken  from  an  Israeli  kibbutz  across  the  border  into  Gaza  on  7  October.

article_title: UK-Israeli hostage has been forgotten, says mum
sentence: Israel  launched  a  military  campaign  in  Gaza  in  response  to  the  unprecedented  attack  on  southern  Israel  on  7  October  by  Hamas  gunmen,  during  which  about  1,200  people  were  killed  and  251  taken  hostage.

article_title: UK-Israeli hostage has been forgotten, says mum
sentence: At  least  41,870  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  then,  according  to  the  territory's  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
